trans-unit.source: An activity that receives a message as part of a request/reply message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: 一个作为请求/答复消息交换模式的一部分接收消息的活动。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value of the action header of the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息的操作标头的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content received by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> activity
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置接收的内容<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref>活动

trans-unit.source: The content can be one of the following types: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.
trans-unit.target: 内容可以为以下类型之一︰<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> when receiving a message <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>接收消息时<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>或消息协定类型。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> when receiving data contract types.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>时接收的数据协定类型。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of correlation initializers.
trans-unit.target: 获取相关初始值设定项的集合。
相关初始值设定项的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"></xref> activity paired with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个引用， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"> </xref>活动配对与此<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref>活动。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activities are used together to model a request/response message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply>活动配合使用，请求/响应消息交换模式进行建模。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply></xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is paired with.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定哪些<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>活动<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply>活动配对使用。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>
